Sent pitch today for a story on Dubai Internet City to The Guardian and The Telegraph . urlLink Dubai Internet City is a Middle East base for some of the world's largest and most influential high-tech companies, including Microsoft, Oracle, HP, IBM, Compaq, Dell, Siemens, Canon, Logica, Sony Ericcson and Cisco (to name just a few) and offers these companies "100% tax-free ownership and 100% repatriation of capital and profits with no currency restrictions".
